teas.name: Genmaicha
teas.description: Green tea with a strong roasted flavor

teas.name: Earl Grey
teas.description: Black tea leaves dried with a Bergamot for a citrus flavor

teas.name: Matcha
teas.description: Green tea stone ground into powder. Mix powder with water and drink.

teas.name: Chamomile
teas.description: Herbal tea made from dried chamomile flowers.

teas.name: Rooibos
teas.description: Herbal tea made from the Rooibos bush.

teas.name: Oolong
teas.description: Green tea oxidized by sun exposure. It is often flavored in different ways.
